page.title: 04 LIFE STYLES
page.content: We asked people in our block about their shopping habits. Most people go shopping once a week.There aren't any shops in Bitterley so we think that when people go shopping they get a good store of food in.It would seem that people shop on Friday because it might be the day when they have their wages and they go out and spend it.Most people use the breadman because it's an important food and if it isn't fresh it will go stale.Nearly as many people shop for people outside the immediate family as don't.Twenty two people shop for people outside the immediate family because some people might have old friends and neighbours who are too old to shop for themselves.Most people travel 5 miles to Ludlow because it's the most convenient place to shop.
